message.content:
Let's calculate this step by step:

1. When you were 6 years old, your sister was half your age, so she was (6/2) = 3 years old.
2. From the time when you were 6 and your sister was 3, until now when you are 80, there are 74 years (80 - 6).
3. During these 74 years, your sister has also grown older by the same amount of time.
4. To find out how old your sister is now, add the initial age of 3 to the 74-year difference: 3 + 74 = 77.

So, your sister is currently 77 years old.
